about.title: About Us
about.description: Melhor Saúde is Mozambique's leading corporate wellness platform, created to transform how companies care for their people. We were born from the need for complete, accessible, and effective solutions that promote stronger, more humane, and productive organizational environments. We combine technology, professional trust, and a people-centered approach to connect companies, employees, and health and wellness specialists. We operate with ethical rigor, valuing confidentiality and professional secrecy in all consultations, and offer humanized, strategic, and digital care that redefines the wellness experience in the corporate environment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We promote comprehensive employee well-being through secure, personalized digital solutions sustained by the four pillars of health: psychological, legal, financial, and physical. Our goal is to help companies create healthy, positive, and sustainable work environments where everyone can thrive with balance and autonomy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We want to be the leading national reference in corporate wellness solutions. We work to build a new organizational culture in Mozambique — more conscious, humane, and committed to the complete and continuous care of employees in all essential areas of their lives.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: We act with ethics, transparency, and human focus. We value confidentiality, responsible use of technology, and active listening. We believe in the real impact of psychological, legal, financial, and physical care — with measurable, accessible solutions centered on each person's needs.

whatIs.question: What is Melhor Saúde?
whatIs.intro: Melhor Saúde is Mozambique's leading digital corporate wellness platform offering four essential pillars:
whatIs.mental: Mental health: Individual sessions with certified psychologists, 24/7 support, and specialized group therapy.
whatIs.physical: Physical wellness: Access to doctors and nutritionists, personalized meal plans, and exercise programs.
whatIs.financial: Financial assistance: Consultancy with certified specialists, budget creation, and investment planning.
whatIs.legal: Legal Assistance: Consultancy with lawyers specialized in family, civil, and labor law.

howToBook.question: How does session booking work?
howToBook.answer: Booking is simple: choose one of the four pillars (Mental health, Physical wellness, Financial assistance, or Legal Assistance), and the system automatically assigns an available provider specialized in the area. You can book online or in-person sessions through our platform.

sessionsQuota.question: How many sessions am I entitled to?
sessionsQuota.answer: The number of sessions varies according to your plan. Companies receive monthly quotas based on the number of employees, while individual users have monthly, quarterly, or annual plans. You can check your available session balance in your personal account.

individualPlans.question: How much do individual plans cost?
individualPlans.intro: We offer three individual plan options:
individualPlans.quarterly: Quarterly: MZN 6,649 per month (MZN 19,947 every 3 months) - Most popular
individualPlans.annual: Annual: MZN 6,019 per month (MZN 72,228 per year) - Best value
individualPlans.access: All plans include full access to the four wellness pillars.

businessPlans.question: Are there plans for businesses?
businessPlans.intro: Yes, we offer customized business solutions:
businessPlans.small: Small Teams: Starting at MZN 6,019 per user/month with volume discounts.
businessPlans.large: Large Companies: Customized pricing with HR integration, centralized management, and dedicated support.
businessPlans.contact: Contact us for a customized proposal for your company.

selfHelp.question: Can I access self-help content?
selfHelp.answer: Yes! Our platform includes a Self-Help section with educational articles organized by categories such as stress management, nutrition, physical exercise, and mental well-being. We also offer psychological tests for self-assessment.

providers.question: What types of providers are available?
providers.answer: We have a network of certified providers in each pillar: clinical psychologists, family doctors, nutritionists, physiotherapists, certified financial consultants, lawyers specialized in family, civil, and labor law. All providers are rigorously selected and certified.

confidentiality.question: Are consultations confidential?
confidentiality.answer: Absolutely. We respect the privacy and dignity of each user with the highest degree of professional secrecy. All sessions are confidential and data is protected according to best security practices. No information is shared with employers or third parties without express consent.

sessionTypes.question: Can I have in-person sessions or are they only online?
sessionTypes.answer: We offer both options. You can choose between online sessions (via video call) or in-person sessions, depending on provider availability and your location. Online sessions provide greater flexibility, while in-person sessions offer direct contact.

cancelReschedule.question: How can I cancel or change a scheduled session?
cancelReschedule.answer: You can manage your bookings through your personal account on the platform. To cancel or reschedule a session, access your booking history and select the available options. We recommend at least 24 hours' notice for changes.

extraServices.question: Are there extra services available?
extraServices.answer: Yes, we offer specialized extra services beyond the four main pillars. These include corporate workshops, occupational health assessments, personalized wellness programs, and other complementary services. You can consult and request extra services through the platform.

getStarted.question: How can I start using the platform?
getStarted.answer: It's simple: register on the platform, choose your plan (individual or business), complete your profile, and start booking sessions. New users can try the platform and, if not satisfied, can cancel within the guarantee period.
